skins.description: After finishing her education, including her MD and PhD in Switzerland, Angela Ziegler continued her research and served as head of surgery in a prominent hospital in her home country.

skins.description: When Lúcio was younger, in addition to his first love, hockey, he also found the time to play football with the other kids in Rio de Janeiro.

skins.name: Striker
skins.description: When Lúcio was younger, in addition to his first love, hockey, he also found the time to play football with the other kids in Rio de Janeiro.

skins.name: Champion
skins.description: A champion weightlifter in her home country, Zarya retired on the eve of the world championships to enlist in the Russian defense forces.

voicelines.name: Keep your eye on the ball

skins.name: Dr. Junkenstein
skins.description: As the tale goes, Dr. Junkenstein made a deal with the Witch of the Wilds in exchange for the secret to creating life. But his triumph was short lived as he was slain by four wanderers in Adlersbrunn.

skins.name: Witch
skins.description: The Witch of the Wilds is a mysterious figure who appears in the tale of Dr. Junkenstein and others, offering people the object of their desire, for a price.

skins.name: Pumpkin
skins.description: In the tale of Dr. Junkenstein, the Reaper was a servant to the Witch of the Wilds, bound to serve her for some unknown reason.

skins.name: Junkenstein's Monster
skins.description: Armed with the secret of creating artificial life, Dr. Jamison Junkenstein birthed a monster.

skins.name: Dragon
skins.description: As the tales tell, the Witch of the Wilds had many powerful allies, including the draconic summoner.

skins.name: Viking
skins.description: After his village was burned by a dragon's fire, the viking now travels the world, hunting them.

sprays.name: Flaming Pumpkin
sprays.description: Survive 12 bonus waves in Junkenstein Endless.

sprays.name: Halloween Special
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge on Legendary difficulty.

sprays.name: Junkenstein's Revenge
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge on Hard difficulty.

sprays.name: My Creations
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein Endless with 6 different heroes.

sprays.name: Rise of the Zomnics
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge using each of the 4 heroes.

sprays.name: The Monster
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein Endless on Hard difficulty with no damage to the door.

sprays.name: The Reapening
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge on Hard difficulty with no damage to the door.

sprays.name: The Reaper
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge on Expert difficulty.

sprays.name: The Witch
sprays.description: Survive 4 bonus waves in Junkenstein Endless on Expert difficulty.

sprays.name: Zombardier
sprays.description: Survive 4 bonus waves in Junkenstein Endless on Hard difficulty.

sprays.name: Zomnic
sprays.description: Win Junkenstein's Revenge with 6 different heroes.

poses.name: R.I.P.
poses.description: Responsible for so many deaths during the Omnic Crisis, even today Bastion units are a symbol of fear.

skins.name: Andes
skins.description: When the weather gets cold, Lúcio heads to the Andes to hit the slopes.

skins.name: Santaclad
skins.description: At the gentle urging of his wife, Ingrid, Torbjörn dresses up as Santa for the Lindholm holiday celebrations.

sprays.name: Bonk
sprays.description: Kill 2 enemies with a single use of Mei's Flurry in Mei's Snowball Offensive.

sprays.name: Frozen Throne
sprays.description: Win a round as the sole survivor in Mei's Snowball Offensive.

sprays.name: Snowcree
sprays.description: Kill an enemy with a snowball from 25 meters away in Mei's Snowball Offensive.

sprays.name: Snowhog
sprays.description: Kill 3 enemies while they are picking up snow in a game of Mei's Snowball Offensive.

sprays.name: Snowmei
sprays.description: Win Mei's Snowball Offensive without losing a round.

sprays.name: Snowreaper
sprays.description: Kill 4 enemies without missing in Mei's Snowball Offensive.

sprays.name: Yeti
sprays.description: Eat 4 meat as the Yeti in Yeti Hunter.

sprays.name: Yeti Hunter
sprays.description: Trap the Yeti as a Hunter in Yeti Hunter.

sprays.name: Yeti Rage
sprays.description: Kill 3 enemies as the Yeti in Yeti Hunt.

voicelines.name: It's a giving time of year
I Made That Just for You
Did you bring me a present?
Go on... give it a shake!
I could use the time off
Can't I guide your way tonight
I have your present right here

sprays.name: Auspicious Lion
sprays.description: Recover a flag in a game of Capture the Flag.

sprays.name: Awakened Lion
sprays.description: Win Capture the Flag with a score of 3 to 0.

sprays.name: Captured Flag
sprays.description: Capture a flag in a game of Capture the Flag.

sprays.name: Interrupted Delivery
sprays.description: Kill an enemy as they carry the flag in a game of Capture the Flag.

voicelines.name: I have the devil's own luck
It's all gone to the dogs

voicelines.name: A chicken out of a feather
If you make your bed, lie in it
Time to roll up my sleeves
I didn't ask for your opinion
I know you can do better
My fate is written in blood
Turn it up in my headphones
I was only trying to help
I live for a good fight
I'd love to stay and chat

skinsLegendary.name: Socialite
skinsLegendary.description: As the daughter of socialites, Ashe feels just as comfortable at charity balls as she does on a motorcycle.

skinsLegendary.name: Talon
skinsLegendary.description: After his service in the Caribbean Coalition was complete, Baptiste struggled to find a demand for his unique skills. Talon was more than happy to help.

skinsLegendary.name: Gwishin
skinsLegendary.description: The Gwishin omnic colossus rose from the omnium in the East China Sea. The Mobile Exo-Force of the Korean Army, or MEKA, was formed in response to the Gwishin's constant attacks.

skinsLegendary.name: Deadlock
skinsLegendary.description: In their younger days, Jesse McCree and Elizabeth "Calamity" Ashe co-founded the Deadlock Gang.

skinsLegendary.name: Scientist
skinsLegendary.description: To this day, Dr. O'Deorain remains a controversial figure in genetic research. Her brilliance was never in question; her ethics, almost always.

skinsLegendary.name: Formal: 76
skinsLegendary.description: During his service in Overwatch, Jack Morrison received many commendations for his leadership.

icons.name: Nullmari
icons.description: Complete Uprising (All Heroes) with 8 different heroes.

skins.name: Null Sector
skins.description: Bastion units were reengineered and upgraded by Null Sector and deployed during the King's Row Uprising.

skins.name: Lieutenant Wilhelm
skins.description: Lieutenant Reinhardt Wilhelm served with distinction in his time during Overwatch, notably leading the strike team that ended the King's Row uprising.

skins.name: Talon
skins.description: Doomfist rose in power in Talon after killing his mentor, Akinjide Adeyemi, the Scourge of Numbani.

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: After agreeing to aid the organization, Genji was upgraded extensively by Overwatch's cyberneticists.

skins.name: Scion
skins.description: Over the centuries, the Shimada clan grew to profit from a lucrative trade in arms and other illegal substances.

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: A young Jesse McCree was recruited into Blackwatch after Gabriel Reyes saw his potential and gave him a choice: join Blackwatch, or rot in prison.

skins.name: Pajamei
skins.description: Due to a malfunction of Ecopoint: Antarctica's cryogenics facility, Mei was kept in hibernation for almost a decade and woke up to find a new, unfamiliar world.

skins.name: Combat Medic Ziegler
skins.description: When called upon, Mercy would don her Valkyrie swift-response suit to participate in Overwatch missions.

skins.name: Blackwatch
skins.description: In addition to her research as a part of Blackwatch, Moira occasionally participated in clandestine operations, including the Venice Incident.

skins.name: Null Sector
skins.description: During the King's Row Uprising, Null Sector employed redesigned and upgraded OR14 Idina bots to secure the power station.

skins.name: Soldier: 24
skins.description: Before serving on the original Overwatch strike team, Gabriel Reyes was selected to be a member of the government's classified soldier enhancement program.

skins.name: Talon
skins.description: Sombra is only too happy to utilize the power and reach of Talon while pursuing her own goals.

skins.name: Chief Engineer Lindholm
skins.description: For many years, Torbjörn Lindholm served as Overwatch's chief engineer, designing many of the organization's iconic weapons and technologies.

skins.name: Cadet Oxton
skins.description: Tracer was put into active duty as an Overwatch agent for the first time during the King's Row uprising.

skins.name: Specimen 28
skins.description: The gorilla known as Specimen 28 showed rapid brain development from genetic therapy, surpassing that of the other subjects.

voicelines.name: If lost, please return to Efi
You need to learn to relax
How do you like me now?
I was only trying to help
Have a bad feeling about this
Why didn't I think of that?
Can't keep a good ape down

skins.name: Sherlock
skins.description: "My mind," he said, "rebels at stagnation. Give me problems, give me work, give me the most abstruse cryptogram or the most intricate analysis, and I am in my proper atmosphere."

skinsLegendary.name: Academy
skinsLegendary.description: While she was in high school, Hana "D.Va" Song held the #1 rank in Mecha Guardian V and won the world championship, surpassing her teammate, Yuna "D.mon" Lee, and her biggest rival, Kyung-soo "King" Han.
